headline: BillingPlatform Named a Leader in Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Recurring Billing Applications for the Second Consecutive Year
summary: BillingPlatform, the enterprise revenue lifecycle management platform for today's innovative business models, today announced it has been named a Leader in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Recurring Billing Applications for the second consecutive year.

headline: 3 Out-of-Favor Stocks with Warning Signs
summary: Hitting a new 52-week low can be a pivotal moment for any stock. These floors often mark either the beginning of a turnaround story or confirmation that a company faces serious headwinds.

headline: Tencent Cloud Recognized as a Representative Vendor in Gartner® Market Guide for Data Lakehouse Platforms
summary: On September 23, Gartner released the Market Guide for Data Lakehouse Platforms report. Tencent Cloud, with DLC (Data Lake Compute), its cloud native serverless lakehouse engine, is listed in the 22 representative data lakehouse platform vendors worldwide.
